choices: The cat (You didn't know they had)
The daughters bff (They had a sleep over) Bel
1.content: You jumped awake heart pounding hard and fast. You think back to your dream for some reason you can only remember what the wizard said but no matter how hard you try you can't remember the spell. After about 10mins of thinking about it you decide to check the time, it's 2am during summer vacation. You decide to test out if the dream was true or not and you left your apartment and locked it, you walked up stars to the 2nd floor apartments (there are 2. One in front and the other in back). You stand infront of the front apartment and think of who lives there. Only 2 people a mother and her 12 year old daughter. You decide to use them as a test so you close your eyes and focus, relax your mind. when you open your eyes you freak out realizing you are now half an inch tall. You quickly regain your cool and crawl under their front door to see if anyone is awake. Once in side you see...
1.title: The Beginning....

11.content: You get inside and see Lilly. But what is she doing?
11.title: The mother Lilly

114.content:
You watch Lilly walk into the living room and start to follow her, when you finaly reached the doorway you notice that Lilly and Monica were watching a movie together. Lilly was sitting on the couch with a bowl of popcorn and Monica was laying on the floor watching the movie with a jumbo bowl of popcorn and a bottle of soda on either side of her. They were both into the movie, nows your chance to expore.

Where do you go?
114.title: Walking into the living room

1141.content: Where do you go towards Monica?
1141.title: To Monica

choices: Wait for popcorn to fall and jump on it
1142.content: How do you get to her?
1142.title: To Lilly

choices: Go over to the dirty hamper
1152.content:
You see Lilly walking by you and you quickly hop onto her foot as she walks into Monica's room to check on her. Once she's in monica's room you hop off as she walks over to Monica's bed kisses her and
says outloud 'Why did she goto sleep fully naked? Oh well as long as shes comfy its ok.' Then walks out closing the door fully behind her.

Now you are locked in Monica's room at 2am while she's sleeping fully naked. What do you do?
1152.title: Going to check on Monica

11521.content:
You can't help feeling conflicted. Should you really do it? But your body moves on its own accord, taking you up, climbing on her blanket, Monica's breaths traveling to your ears. But just as you're about to get in, the blanket slips down. Frightened, you jump, falling onto the bed.

"Oh fuck..." You look up. "Oh... FUUUUCK!" Her massive, naked body enters your vision. Like looking up a mountain, on your left her long long legs and then the two delicate, rounded peaks: her butt. In your front her curved back, enhancing the the view of her ass, and finally, on your right is her hair, falling on her upper back, growing from the back of her smiling-through-sleep face.

You gulp, hesitating between which direction to explore first, forgetting all notions of morality: something you may have to pay for later...
11521.title: Go over to Monica's bed

choices: Sitting on the kitchen floor watching her phone
1153.title: More choices

info.brief_description: This is a FULLY UNAWARE story.
info.description:
You are Adam and your in your early 20's one night you fall asleep thinking nonstop about your giantess fetish and how you always wanted it to be completely unaware no matter what. During your dream you find a wizard and he shows you a book of spells and has 1 marked to show you. You read it aloud without thinking then he speaks: 'you can now live out your fetish as soon as you wake up.' And with that you jumped awake.

CHARACTERS:
Monica: age 12 sweet girl, loves bugs.
https://images.app.goo.gl/DrPMLcxW12rg2VYz6
Lilly: Monica's mother age 40, friendly to everyone, if she sees a bug of any kind she ignores them.
Bel: Monica's BFF age 11 sweet girl, hates bugs.
Luna: Monica's cat. Lazy and doesn't mind bugs.





*I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO REMOVE/EDIT ANY CHAPTERS ADDED IF I BELIEVE ITS NEEDED*

RULES:
*No Death to the main character.
*No ending the story, find ways to keep it going.
*Adam can be molded into anything and everything, but given enough time he will reform back to his tiny state.
*Sex stuff is allowed with all characters no matter the age.



Rules will be added as I see fit. Other than that ENJOY!
